title: violastan2
author: violastan2
content: As Title:Is there any good quality M2e project we can earn free tokens for before it starts to launch?If anyone knows, please let me knowThank you

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: violastan2 on August 21, 2022, 08:01:59 AMAs Title:Is there any good quality M2e project we can earn free tokens for before it starts to launch?If anyone knows, please let me knowThank youAs much as there are a lot of list of m2e or move to earn.  For sure there will be catch on those projects. The very first nft generated a good stance but later on depleted due to some reasons of legality or big issues.  The following projects did the same too,  hype then go down or fall later on.  So I dont recommend any p2e or m2e type of projects cause cant sustain it for so long especially when the users are increasing.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: violastan2 on August 21, 2022, 08:01:59 AMAs Title:Is there any good quality M2e project we can earn free tokens for before it starts to launch?If anyone knows, please let me knowThank youThere’s no way you can earn M2E tokens before it was even launch because the token smart contract usually generate after the IDO. Technically you are looking for an M2E project that don’t have an IDO and just start the project for free distribution of tokens through playing there games. So far I don’t see this kind of project that exist and if you really looking for a good project then you should not looking for free because good project invest money on there product development which means they want money to cover there expenses and fund there development.StepN is the best M2E project so far while the rest is just a copy cat which usually die later on. You should pay for the tokens if you are looking for a quality project because that’s where the cool project belongs.

comments.author: FirmWars
comments.body: Either M2E or P2E you can only make good gains if they use fair launch strategy instead of IDO or IEO, with fair launch you can buy the token on launched day and start earning instantly.
